title: Benchmark signs contracts for metal plasma thrusters
summary: Benchmark Space Systems announced contracts to sell around two dozen metal plasma thrusters based on technology the Burlington, Vermont-based startup acquired last year.

title: Virgin Orbit pauses operations
summary: Launch vehicle company Virgin Orbit has paused its operations and furloughed its staff for at least a week as it deals with financial issues.

title: Voyager Space acquires ZIN Technologies to support Starlab development
summary: Voyager Space has acquired engineering company ZIN Technologies to help build up expertise needed for its Starlab commercial space station.

title: DEVELOPING STORY: Virgin Orbit Pauses Operations, Furloughs Staff, Seeks Funding
summary: Virgin Orbit has announced that it will be furloughing almost all of its employees and halting operations for a week as it seeks a new funding lifeline.

title: NASA Mars Odyssey Orbiter Fuel Supply Running Low
summary: NASA's Mars Odyssey Orbiter has been studying the Red Planet for the past 22 years, but the orbiter is approaching the end of its mission as its running low on fuel.

title: Virgin Orbit pauses operations for a week, furloughs nearly entire staff as it seeks funding
summary: Virgin Orbit is furloughing nearly all its employees and pausing operations for a week as it looks for a funding lifeline, people familiar with the matter told CNBC.

title: NanoAvionics to build three more IoT satellites for OQ Technology
summary: WASHINGTON — OQ Technology of Luxembourg, which raised $13 million in September to build out a small constellation of 5G narrowband nanosatellites for so-called Internet of Things connectivity, ordered three additional satellites from Kongsberg NanoAvionics. NanoAvionics has built three satellites for OQ Technology to date, two of which are already in orbit. The launch of […]

title: Official Lunar Time Zone Coming Soon
summary: an initiative is underway to establish an official time zone for the Moon, with the aim of facilitating reference for all lunar systems, including robotic missions and human surface stays.

title: Engineers Keep an Eye on Fuel Supply of NASA's Oldest Mars Orbiter
summary: Measuring the fuel supply on a decades-old spacecraft without a fuel gauge is no easy task.

title: Goonhilly Announces US Sat Comm Network Expansion
summary: Goonhilly Earth Station continues its global expansion with the acquisition of two teleports in the United States.
